detailsData.title: Experienced Lawyers
detailsData.content: With over 35 years of experience, our lawyers are consistently recognized as leaders in their fields.

detailsData.title: State-of-the-Art Technology
detailsData.content: We rely on cutting-edge technology to serve clients effectively and keep costs down.

detailsData.title: Extensive Network
detailsData.content: Our affiliations with experts in various fields ensure our clients receive the best possible outcomes.

address: 30765 Pacific Coast Hwy, Suite 411, Malibu, CA 90265, United States
valueProp: Holmes Weinberg is a powerhouse boutique law firm founded in 2008 by veteran lawyers Henry Holmes and Steven Weinberg. We provide legal expertise and business insight to build, expand, protect, and defend our clients’ careers, businesses, brands, images, and rights.

testimonalData.text: Holmes Weinberg provided exceptional legal support for my business. Highly recommended!

testimonalData.text: The team at Holmes Weinberg is professional and knowledgeable. They helped me navigate complex legal issues with ease.

testimonalData.text: I am grateful for the dedicated service I received from Holmes Weinberg. They truly care about their clients' success.
